articles.description: A team in charge of a nature reserve on the Northumberland coast have confirmed it has had cases of Avian Influenza.
articles.content: Lindisfarne National Nature Reserve (NNR) has said it sent two birds away for tests, which returned positive for the disease, which is also known as bird flu and can affect people and other mammals.… [+2253 chars]

articles.author: Pamela Duncan
articles.title: UK coronavirus death toll passes 75,000 - The Guardian
articles.description: Grim milestone comes just weeks after UK passed 60,000 deaths - showing how quickly second wave has spread
articles.content:
The UKs total Covid death toll has passed 75,000, according to a tally of all fatalities that mention the disease on death certificates.
